Fish farm assessment

Source: vignettes/fish-farm-assessment.Rmd
fish-farm-assessment.Rmd

Welcome

This document has been created following the generic assessment guidance.

Details

attribute value optional
standard_short Fish Farm assessment TRUE
quality_element NA TRUE
parameter Benthic Invertebrates, Benthic DNA, Sediment Chemistry TRUE
standard_long Fish Farm assessment TRUE
aggregation event FALSE
status prototype FALSE
